announcement:
❗(15-09-2025) It has come to our notice that recurring reminders are not working as expected. We are already working on a fix, and this issue will be resolved within the next two days. Thank you for your patience.
📢 Internship Season Update
Dear Users, as this year’s internship season nears its end, the frequency of internship postings on AirUni Connect may decrease. Verified opportunities will continue to be shared as soon as they are available. Thank you for your support
